about_the_game:
When you put on the VR goggles, you find yourself in an alien nest with captive girls. What will you do, seeing that they can't move their hands or feet?
Touching them with your hands, thrusting with your tentacles, corroding their bodies—the choice is yours!

Game explanation:
You can freely touch or grab with alien-like hands.
You can touch girls with tentacles, which you can control freely.
You can also use a cube to change between situations.

Controls:
Use six degrees of freedom effectively to peek from various angles.
By touching the cube, you can change the situation and appearance.



Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

Execute the following file to start DLC.
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Hentai VR 2\hentaivr2\vrgame01.exe

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:

> Sexual violence

> genitals
> lewd situations
> dominance and sadomasochism

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: Hentai VR 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: After turning into an alien, it's your chance to attack beautiful women who can't move! Imagine being an alien full of tentacles—you get to enjoy an incomparable feeling of conquest. Please enjoy this high quality VR experience offering a higher sense of reality and immersion!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Ukrainian*, Dutch*, Greek*, Swedish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Czech*, Danish*, Turkish*, Norwegian*, Hungarian*, Finnish*, Bulgarian*, Vietnamese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Polish*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
